definition: newly come into prominence, organized opposition to authority
details:
adjective
- newly come into prominence
= example: newly come into prominence
- coming to maturity
= example: coming to maturity
= synonyms: emerging
- sloping upward
= synonyms: uphill
- advancing or becoming higher or greater in degree or value or status
= example: advancing or becoming higher or greater in degree or value or status
noun

- a movement upward
